qa_pair.question: Find all compute instances using shapes from the VM.Standard.E4 family. Among these, which instance has the highest average CPU utilization over the last 24 hours? Provide the instance display name.
List all stopped instances that have been stopped for more than 30 days. How many such instances exist across all compartments?
Find the compute instance with the most attached block volumes. What is the total storage capacity in GB attached to this instance?
Identify instances where memory utilization has exceeded 90% at any point in the last 7 days. What is the display name of the instance with the longest duration above 90%?
Among all running instances, find the one created earliest (oldest). What year was it created? Answer with just the year (e.g., 2023).
Calculate the total OCPU count across all running instances in the 'production' compartment and its sub-compartments. What is the total?
Find instances that have both a public IP and a private IP assigned. How many instances meet this criteria?
Identify the availability domain with the most running instances. What is the AD name suffix (e.g., AD-1, AD-2, or AD-3)?
Find the instance with display name containing 'bastion'. What is its private IP address?
Among instances using burstable shapes, which one has consumed the most burst credits in the last 30 days? Provide the instance OCID's last 8 characters.
